replies.msg:
Scott Perry之前提嘅法案都係唔太現實，根本冇乜可能過
https://www.congress.gov/bill/116th-congress/house-bill/6946/text
https://www.congress.gov/bill/116th-congress/house-bill/6945/text
禁止美國交會費畀聯合國/WHO直至中國會籍被中止同台灣成為成員國
https://www.congress.gov/bill/116th-congress/house-bill/6948/text
授權總統承認西藏獨立
https://www.congress.gov/bill/116th-congress/house-bill/6947/text
授權總統承認香港獨立
https://www.congress.gov/bill/116th-congress/house-bill/7981/text
禁止聯邦資金用於稱中國國家主席為president
https://www.congress.gov/bill/116th-congress/house-bill/7982/text
不承認中國對尖閣列島、南沙群島、黃岩島、西沙群島等領土要求
會唔會見倒習帝架車上面穿左個窿架
